response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which I believe would significantly enhance your operations and contribute to your success. Given its value and potential impact on your business, I am offering it to you at an exclusive price of $12,000. This represents a substantial saving compared to the market value, making it a highly attractive opportunity for you. I look forward to discussing how this product can benefit your company further. Please let me know if you have any questions or need additional information.", "product_price": 12000}
